Package entity

Class Ghost

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.shape.Shape
        • javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle
          • entity.Ghost
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
    public class Ghost
extends javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Represents a ghost within the pacman game. Also has run method to animate the ghost within the maze.
    Author:
    psyfb2
